user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
last_action: click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
reflect_result:
By clicking on the shopping cart icon at the top right, the screen transitions to show the current contents of the shopping cart. This action directly supports your user request by allowing you to view the items already in the cart. However, based on the screenshots, the shopping cart view is displayed, but no progress has been made toward adding the "Razer Nari" item yet, nor is there any indication that the item has been searched for or added.

In order to complete your request, the next steps should involve searching for "Razer Nari" on Amazon, selecting the first item from the results, and adding it to the cart. This action is necessary for completing the second part of your user request.
